name: AWAY (itch) (Ben Marquez Keenan)
description:
Created for the 2019 Global Game Jam. Check out the original entry here.

Design & Programming
Ben Marquez Keenan
Jose Lico

Design & Art
Edgar Jesus

Music is Satellite Bloom, courtesy of Podington Bear used under CC BY-NC 3.0.

N.B. The WebGL version does not work well in Safari. If you try to play the game and it's just music with a title screen and no interaction, then try opening this page in Chrome/Firefox or download one of our native builds for Windows or MacOS. If you have any other issues, please let me know in the comments or by DM and I'll push a fix as soon as I can.
